title: MY FRIEND GOT SCAMMED HELP!!!
body: Hello, my friend got scammed how i said. He was messaged by his old friend with link "free skins bla bla bla" but there wasn't his friend there was a guy who scamed them both. So basically you press the link and your account is gone. Also He can't get back his account by sending message to email. Any help guys? he spent a lot of money on his account :( please.

replies.body: Sorry to hear about your friend falling for this phishing attempt.  :(  No worries, though, we can help him out!  Have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team can help him regain access and as well as assist with any reparations.  We'll need to work with him individually, but thanks for reaching out for him!
He filled account recovery form the same day that i post this (25 days ago), and he's still waiting for answer -_-
